snippet.title: Available on April 14！ CRIMESIGHT Trailer 02
snippet.description:
April 14 Available！
CRIMESIGHT is new mystery simulation game.

Now recruiting players to participate in the Pre-launch Play Session!
Check the official website for details！


CRIMESIGHT Official Website
https://www.konami.com/games/crimesight/us/en/

Twitter
https://twitter.com/CRIMESIGHT_EN

Discord
https://discord.gg/btVcWzFxQS

SteamStore
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491710/CRIMESIGHT/
